

// the test bench and the machine code is below the code
addi x2, x2, 13
l1:
addi x1, x1, 1
beq x1, x2, exit
j l3


l2:
addi x1, x1, 1
j l1


l3:
addi x1, x1, 1
j l2


exit:
addi x31, x31, 1
hlt



// the machine code of each instruction respectively

00010000100000000011010000010011 / 276837395 / 10803413
00001000010000000000010000010011 / 138413075 / 08400413
00000000010001000001100001100011 / 4462691 / 00441863
00000000000000000000000111100111 / 487 / 000001E7
00001000010000000000010000010011 / 138413075 / 08400413
11111111111111111111111001100111 / 4294966887 / FFFFFE67
00001000010000000000010000010011 / 138413075 / 08400413
11111111111111111111111011100111 / 4294967015 / FFFFFEE7
11111111110000000000010000010011 / 4290774035 / FFC00413
00000000000000000000000001111111 / 127 / 0000007F
PC1 = 0; Inst_to_wr = 32'h10803413; #2; 
PC1 = 1; Inst_to_wr = 32'h08400413; #2; 
PC1 = 2; Inst_to_wr = 32'h00441863; #2; 
PC1 = 3; Inst_to_wr = 32'h000001E7; #2; 
PC1 = 4; Inst_to_wr = 32'h08400413; #2; 
PC1 = 5; Inst_to_wr = 32'hFFFFFE67; #2; 
PC1 = 6; Inst_to_wr = 32'h08400413; #2; 
PC1 = 7; Inst_to_wr = 32'hFFFFFEE7; #2; 
PC1 = 8; Inst_to_wr = 32'hFFC00413; #2; 
PC1 = 9; Inst_to_wr = 32'h0000007F; #2;
